subjectArea.name: M - Big Data Movie
subjectArea.description: A movie application log data residing in Hadoop HDFS is sourced using different access mechanisms (website click stream logs).

filter.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D1 Products (Level Based Hier).P3k  LOB Key

filter.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:06 - Federated Sources.D1 Products.P0  Product Number

filter.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:06 - Federated Sources.D1 Products.P0  Product Number

filter.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D3 Offices.D4k  Company Key

filter.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2) AND  CAST (%3 AS VARCHAR ( 5 )) <>  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D3 Offices.D4k  Company Key
logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D1 Products (Level Based Hier).P3k  LOB Key

filter.expressionTemplate: ISDESCENDANT(%1,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2)) OR %3 =  CAST ( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2) AS INTEGER )
